thread.title: U.S. EPA says "likely" recall of VW diesel cars
thread.title_full: U.S. EPA says "likely" recall of VW diesel cars

title: U.S. EPA says "likely" recall of VW diesel cars
text:
U.S. EPA says "likely" recall of VW diesel cars SAN FRANCISCO 
SAN FRANCISCO Oct 1 The U.S. Environmental Protection Agency said on Thursday that a recall of affected Volkswagen < diesel cars in the ongoing emissions scandal would "likely" take place. 
"EPA will require VW to remedy the noncompliance. It is likely that there will be a recall of affected vehicles," an EPA spokesperson said, adding that no specific timeline had been ordered yet. 
The German car maker has said it would refit up to 11 million diesel vehicles worldwide. (Reporting By Rory Carroll; Writing by Alexandria Sage ) Trending On Reuters
